dct_title_s: Map exhibiting the experimental and located lines for the New-York and New-Haven Rail-Road
dct_description_sm: Detailed topographic strip map showing the coast from New York City to New Haven, Conn. Indicates drainage, relief by hachures, cities and towns, roads, and railroads. Chartered in 1844, organized in 1846, opened in 1849. [From published bibliography].
dcat_keyword_sm: New York and New Haven Railroad Company
